alby_hub.description: A self-custodial Lightning wallet that connects to Alby Extension for web interactions, Alby Go for real-world payments, and hundreds of apps via Nostr Wallet Connect (NWC).

aqua.description: A global Bitcoin wallet focused on financial inclusion, designed for Latin America. Uses Boltz swaps for Lightning payments.

bitkit.description: A simple, powerful self-custodial wallet for instant payments anywhere. Manage your own channels or use Blocktank LSP.

blink.description: A custodial Bitcoin wallet for everyday use. Simple, secure, and requires a phone number to sign up.

blitz.description: A self-custodial Bitcoin and Lightning wallet using Breez SDK. Starts with Liquid swaps (Boltz) and evolves into an embedded node with LSP-managed channels.

blixt.description: An open-source, non-custodial Lightning wallet for Android and iOS, packed with features for Bitcoiners exploring the Lightning Network.

breez.description: A non-custodial Lightning wallet with an embedded node, POS, podcast player, and marketplace—delivering a top-tier Bitcoin experience.

coinos.description: A free, easy-to-use web wallet and payment page supporting Lightning (BOLT11/BOLT12), Liquid, Ecash, and on-chain payments. Self-hosting available.

electrum.description: A fast, secure Bitcoin wallet for desktop and Android, trusted since 2011 for a wide range of users.

muun.description: A self-custodial Bitcoin and Lightning wallet using submarine swaps. Easy to use, though on-chain fees can increase costs.

phoenix.description: A Lightning-native wallet with seamless payments—fast, cheap, and LSP-managed for simplicity.

primal.description: A Nostr client with a built-in Bitcoin wallet, offering smooth feeds and easy onboarding for Nostr beginners.

rtl.description: A powerful, self-hosted web tool for managing Lightning nodes, ideal for advanced and business users.

sati.description: A WhatsApp bot for fast, secure Bitcoin and stablecoin payments—no extra app needed, with super-easy onboarding.

speed.description: A custodial wallet for instant, secure, low-fee Bitcoin and USDT payments, available as a mobile app or browser extension.

wallet_of_satoshi.description: A zero-configuration custodial Lightning wallet for iOS and Android, prioritizing simplicity—world's most popular Lightning wallet.

zbd.description: A mobile app to earn Bitcoin through games, surveys, polls, and app discovery—fun and rewarding.

zeus.description: A powerful, open-source, self-custodial Bitcoin wallet for managing remote nodes or its embedded node, feature-rich for advanced users.

common.selectTwoWallets: Please select two wallets to compare.
common.selectDifferentWallets: Please select two different wallets to compare.

hidden.notHiddenAnyWallets: You haven't hidden any wallets yet.
hidden.notHiddenAnyFeatures: You haven't hidden any features yet.

hidden.walletAddedBack: The wallet has been added back to the comparison table.
hidden.featureAddedBack: The feature has been added back to the comparison table.

about.title: About Bitcoin Wallet Comparison
about.description: This Bitcoin Wallet Comparison tool helps users make informed decisions about which Bitcoin wallet best suits their needs.
about.purposeText: Our goal is to provide accurate, up-to-date information about Bitcoin wallets across different types (Lightning, On-Chain, and Hardware) to help you choose the right wallet based on your specific requirements.
about.contributionText: This project is open-source and community-driven. If you'd like to contribute by adding new wallets, updating information, or translating to other languages, please check out our GitHub repository.
about.disclaimerText: The information provided is for educational purposes only. Always do your own research before choosing a wallet to store your bitcoin.
about.introText: Wallet Compare is a project created to help Bitcoin users make informed choices about the wallets they use. Our goal is to provide accurate, up-to-date information about the features and capabilities of various Bitcoin wallets, with a focus on Lightning Network compatibility.
about.dataSources: The data in this comparison is compiled from various sources including:
about.keepCurrent: We strive to keep this information current and accurate, but features and capabilities may change as wallets are updated. If you notice any discrepancies or have suggestions for improvement, please reach out to us.
about.methodologyText: Each wallet is evaluated based on a standard set of criteria, focusing on functionality, security, and usability. We test each feature directly when possible and consult with the developer community to ensure accuracy.
about.evaluations: Our ratings and evaluations are based on objective criteria and do not represent endorsements of any particular wallet. Different wallets excel in different areas, and the "best" wallet depends on your specific needs and preferences.
about.plansText: We are continuously working to improve Wallet Compare with plans to:
about.expandWallets: Expand our comparison to include more wallets
about.addReviews: Add detailed reviews and user experiences
about.metrics: Integrate social metrics and developer activity indicators
about.testing: Create automated testing for feature verification
about.aboutUsText: We are dedicated to improving the Bitcoin ecosystem through education, research, and development of tools that make Bitcoin more accessible and user-friendly. Wallet Compare is one of our initiatives to help both newcomers and experienced users navigate the growing landscape of Bitcoin wallets.
about.contactText: If you have any questions, feedback, or would like to contribute to this project, please contact us.

footer.copyright: © Bitcoin Wallet Comparison. All rights reserved.

help.description: This comparison page allows you to compare the features of different {type} Bitcoin wallets.
help.hoverTip: Hover over wallet names or feature titles to see detailed descriptions.
help.clickTip: Click on wallet names to visit their official websites.
help.searchTip: Use the search box to filter wallets by name or description.
help.wizardTip: Select two wallets in the comparison wizard to see a side-by-side comparison.
help.contributeTip: Use the "Add Wallet" or "Add Feature" buttons to contribute to this comparison.
help.supportedCustom: Feature has special implementation or limitations (hover to see details)
